text: Va hamono ʙa Muso (alajhissalom) kitoʙi Tavrot dodem. Dar on kitoʙ ixtilof sud, (ja'ne, ʙa'zeho ʙa on imon ovardand va ʙa'zeason onro inkor kardand). Agar nameʙud suxane, ki pes sodir suda az coniʙi Parvardigorat, hatman mijonason dovari mesud. Va onho (jahud va kuffori qavmat) alʙatta, dar on kitoʙ (ja'ne, Qur'on) saxt dar suʙhaand
